name: Office (Lovepreet)
description:
Description

I created this game for GameBoy Jam #2. This was the second game jam I had participated in. The game is about a man stuck in a futuristic office who wants to go home. However, in this day and age there are robots patrolling the office to make sure no one can sneak home. Using your portal gun, create portals to get to the switch to unlock the exit door. Avoid the patrolling robots who will try and capture you and teleport you back to your office. “Borrow" office supplies to gain a higher score.

Controls

Movement:
Left and Right arrow keys / A and D keys

Jumping:
Up arrow key / W key / Space bar

Portal Gun:
To make the first portal use the Z key.
To make the second portal use the X key.

Interaction (with switches):
C key
